考.definition: to check; to verify; to test; to examine; to take an exam; to take an entrance exam for; deceased father

考上.definition: to pass a university entrance exam

考克斯報告.definition: Cox Report; Report of the Select Committee on US National Security and Military-Commercial Concerns with the PRC (1999); Committee Chairman Republican Rep. Chris Cox

考入.definition: to pass entrance exam; to enter college after a competitive exam

考公.definition: to sit for a civil service exam

考勤.definition: to check attendance (at school or workplace); to monitor efficiency (of workers)

考區.definition: the exam area; the district where an exam takes place

考取.definition: to pass an entrance exam; to be admitted to

考古.definition: archaeology; to engage in archaeological studies

考官.definition: an examiner; an official conducting an exam

考察.definition: to inspect; to observe and study; on-the-spot investigation

考工記.definition: The Artificer's Record, a technology treaty compiled towards the end of the Spring and Autumn period

考慮.definition: to think over; to consider; consideration

考文垂.definition: Coventry, city in the West Midlands, England

考期.definition: the exam period; the exam date

考本.definition: to take a relevant exam for a certificate (e.g. driving test, license etc)

考核.definition: to examine; to check up on; to assess; to review; appraisal; review; evaluation

考波什堡.definition: Kaposvár in southwest Hungary, capital of Somogy County 紹莫吉州|绍莫吉州[Shao4mo4ji2 Zhou1]

考生.definition: exam candidate; student whose name has been put forward for an exam

考研.definition: to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program

考砸.definition: to flunk; to fail a test

考究.definition: to investigate; to check and research; exquisite

考級.definition: to take a test to establish one's level of proficiency; placement test; (music) grade exam

考綱.definition: exam outline (outline of the content of an exam, published prior to the exam as a guide for examinees) (abbr. for 考試大綱|考试大纲[kao3 shi4 da4 gang1])

考績.definition: to check up on sb's achievements

考試.definition: to take an exam; exam; CL:次[ci4]

考試院.definition: Examination Yuan, the qualification and appointment board under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan; exam board

考證.definition: to do textual research; to make textual criticism; to verify by means of research (esp. historical details); to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])

考進.definition: to gain entry by passing an exam; to be admitted to (a college etc)

考量.definition: to consider; to give serious consideration to sth; consideration

考霸.definition: "exam master", sb who takes many exams and aces all of them

考驗.definition: to test; to put to the test; trial; ordeal
